title: Easy: Sum of Digits
description:
Write a function that calculates the sum of digits of an integer.

#### Function Signature
```pythonndef sum_of_digits(n: int) -> int:```
#### Input
- `n` (int): A non-negative integer.
#### Output
- Returns the sum of the digits of the input integer.
code: def sum_of_digits(n: int) -> int:    return sum(int(digit) for digit in str(n))
tests: assert sum_of_digits(-10) == 'Invalid input. Please enter a non-negative integer.'
